sourcesContent:
import { useParams, Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { useEffect } from "react"; import { getOneSpot, deleteSpot } from "../../store/spotReducer"; const SpotDetails = () => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const { spotId } = useParams(); const spot = useSelector((state) => state.spots.singleSpot) const handleDelete = (id) => { dispatch(deleteSpot(id)) } useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getOneSpot(spotId)) }, [dispatch]) if(!spot) return null return spot.id && (

{spot.name}

{spot?.avgRating} ᛫ {spot?.numReviews} reviews ᛫ {spot.city}, {spot.state}, {spot.country}

Hosted by {spot.Owner.firstName}

{spot.description}

${spot.price} night

{spot.avgRating} ᛫ {spot.numReviews} reviews

) } export default SpotDetails
